channel.title: Hamachi help
channel.description:
Hello mates!
I have played moparscape in the few days now on none hamatchi needed. Then I installed hamatchi then it got crazy, so i unstaill it then it says:
Hamachi version 1.0.0.60 has been detected on your computer. Would you like to procced with an update?
YES / NO
IF I klick on yes it says:
Updating Hamatchi please wait.. Then: You got lucky and update failed Please complian to us at once.
If i Klick on NO it doesent do anything..
I dont know if if putted this topic on right category. But need some help i wanan play some nice servers sune :)
Thanks for all help!
Have a nice day!
/ Filip

item.title: Hamachi help
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

[quote=“seal kay, post:7, topic:7022”][quote author=mjordan link=topic=9751.msg109938#msg109938 date=1154374368]
rofl im the noob? hmm lets see here seal kay just a few questions and answers.
1.(Q)who has been around the cheating communities longer?
(A)me.

2.(Q)who comes to the forums and just leeches and never contributes
back to the community?
(A)you

3.(Q)who posts in the wrong section and when a nice person comes by
to inform them they just yell at them and say “im a leecher and i dont
care, help me NOW!!!”
(A)hmmm…lets see, how about YOU.

so therefore seal kay that makes you the leecher and the noob.and no there is nothing wrong with being a noob. me and everyone else here were once noobs and we had to go through with being called noobs so DEAL WITH IT.what makes me mad is when people like you who are leechers and dont contribute call me a noob when i am infact not.so there you have it

[/quote]

Can you help me or not then shut the fuck up and lick your mothers pussy how bout it your wasting the time fuckhead?[/quote]

Thats my job DickHead

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi help
item.dc:creator: @ipkyouhaha ipkyouhaha
item.description:
@ipkyouhaha wrote:

yea i got the same problem as seal kay…

as i can see and read this is the wrong place for a question like this…i know

but since the question has already been asked, could someone actually help solve the problem? bloodbath, your comment on trying to help doesnt even make sence. both of your ways of solving the problem is getting rid of it or not updateing. obviously he (and me) want it to update. no one (as of yet) has helped us in the least bit. it would be much appriciated if someone could please help

thanks, ipk

my bad, didnt read seal kay’s first post right. thought he was updateing to a different version of hamachi and was getting that error when all he wanted to do was update it and it wasnt working (thats my problem). so bloodbath, sry sry sry…you did anser seal kay’s question and most likely solve his problem, you’re right, his problem wasnt that hard to solve, and im sure mine isnt very hard to solve for you.

thanks again, and sorry for the confusion

Read full topic

item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

Lol, some people need to calm down and follow steps correctly before they get pissed at people.

item.title: Hamachi help
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

Dude, mjordan has a point. He was just helping you by saying it’s in the wroing section. If you didnt want anyone saying tis in the wrong section then dont put, I dunno if this is in the right category. So dont get mad, you have no right to swear at him and demand help. Then he made his point about being newbish.

Now to help you for hamachi problems.
If you want it off then go to add or remove programs and unistall hamachi. And if you dont want it to update then uninstall the updater, and say no when it asks you to update it cuz then it will just keep coming back. Its not that hard. Thanks, thats all.

Read full topic

rofl what crawled up your ass and died? and maybe if you posted in the right section you would get some help and maybe if you werent a leecher then you might get some help also.and i already have helped you. i told you that this was in wrong section nicely so you would mayb post in the right one so you would get some replies and you pretty much just say " whatever you noob just help me so i can go and play my lil moparscape private server" instead of a “o ok thanks man didnt notice that” or something like that.so no i wont help you anymore and im done fighting with you because it is just plain stupid you leecher
